name: Enfeebled Mark
description: Your attacks and abilities deal <dynamic> 5.0% - 15%</dynamic> increased damage to enemies inside Resonating Arrow.

name: Empowered Release
description: Flayed Shot has an additional 5% chance to proc Flayer's Mark and it increases the damage of your next Kill Shot by <dynamic> 5.0% - 20%</dynamic>.

name: Spirit Attunement
description: Wild Spirits duration is increased by 3 sec and the damage dealt is increased by <dynamic> 10.0% - 25%</dynamic>.

name: Necrotic Barrage
description: Death Chakram generates an additional 2 Focus and the damage is increased by <dynamic>5.0% - 20%</dynamic>.

name: Markman's Advantage
description: Hunter's Mark decreases the damage the target deals to you by<dynamic> 3.0% - 10%</dynamic>.

name: Harmony of the Tortollan
description: Aspect of the Turtle cooldown reduced by<dynamic> 10.0 - 32</dynamic> sec.

name: Rejuvenating Wind
description: Exhilaration heals you for an additional<dynamic> 10.0% - 30%</dynamic> of your maximum health over 8 sec.

name: Resilience of the Hunter
description: When Feign Death ends the damage you take is reduced by<dynamic> 3.0% - 10%</dynamic> for until cancelled.

name: Reversal of Fortune
description:
Successfully interrupting an enemy with 

<spec>Beast Mastery</spec><spec>Marksmanship (Level 18)</spec>
<dynamic>Counter Shot - Counter Shot</dynamic>

<spec>Survival</spec>
<dynamic>Muzzle</dynamic>

 grants <dynamic>1</dynamic> Focus.

name: Cheetah's Vigor
description: Aspect of the Cheetah secondary movement speed lasts an addtional 3 sec and the cooldown is reduced by<dynamic> 15.0 - 45</dynamic> sec.

name: Tactical Retreat
description: Disengage slows nearby enemy movement speed by<dynamic> 20.0% - 50%</dynamic> for 3 sec.

name: Ferocious Appetite
description: Kill Command critical hits reduce the cooldown of Aspect of the Wild by <dynamic>1.0 sec - 2.4 sec</dynamic>.

name: One With the Beast
description: Bestial Wrath increases all damage you and your pet deal by <dynamic> 1.0% - 15%</dynamic>.

name: Brutal Projectiles
description: Your auto attacks have a 10% chance to cause your next Rapid Fire to deal<dynamic> 1.0% - 5%</dynamic> increased damage for each shot.

name: Deadly Chain
description: Trick Shots secondary damage is increased by<dynamic> 10.0% - 25%</dynamic>.

name: Powerful Precision
description: Precise Shots increases the damage of your next Arcane Shot or Multi-Shot by an additional<dynamic> 5.0% - 20%</dynamic>.
